sentences.en: All the seat - covers on the train have been torn by vandal.
sentences.cn: 火车上的所有 椅套 全被破坏公物者故意撕破了.
布鲁斯决非蓄意搞破坏的莽汉。

sentences.en: Len was spitting feathers when he saw what some vandal had done to his new car.
sentences.cn: 莱恩看到他的新车遭到破坏时非常生气.

sentences.en: The most efficient in poor light conditions. An extremely sturdy, vandal - proof PV.
sentences.cn: 是在光照差的条件下最有效的PV,耐用 、 结实.

sentences.en: The street lights were out, smashed by vandals.
sentences.cn: 那些路灯不亮了，是被破坏分子们打碎的。

sentences.en: Top mounted vandal resistant EZ - TC - SS test cocks provide access for testing - no tools or fittings for testing.
sentences.cn: 顶部安装防破坏EZ-TC-SS测试旋塞,易于检测 - 检测时不需要工具或连接件.

sentences.en: Vandal have pull the telephone out of the call boxes.
sentences.cn: 破坏公共财产者将电话机扯到电话亭外.

words.tran_cn: 汪达尔人作风；故意毁坏文物的行为；破坏他人财产的行为

trans.tran_cn: 故意毁坏文物者，破坏他人财产者
trans.tran_en: someone who deliberately damages things, especially public property
